head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths ZORNBERG, ELY MARC

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths ZORNBERG, ELY MARC

block.p: ZORNBERG-Ely Marc. The NY Chapter of Hadassah notes with deep sorrow the passing of Ely Marc, beloved son of Florence and Dr. Ed Zornberg. Those wishing to honor Ely's memory may contribute to a special fund attention Shalom Fanny Zornberg Group at NY Chapter of Hadassah, 575 Lexington Ave, NYC 10022 Arline Kempner, President Lois Shallit, Exec. Dir.
